<template>
    <button @click="onClick()" :style="{background:color}" class="btn">{{ text }}</button>
</template>

<script>
export default{
    name:'Button-i',
    props:{
text: String,
color: String
    },
    methods:{
        onClick(){
            this.$emit(toggle)
        } 
    }


}

</script>
